title: Zerodha Clone: Full-Stack Trading App
description: A trading platform clone built to simulate stock market functionalities. Features include real-time stock data, user authentication, and portfolio management.

title: Naye Pankh - Fundraising Portal for Interns (MERN Stack)
description: A secure and efficient platform where organizations create fundraising campaigns, and interns connect with potential donors for financial support.

title: Expense Tracker App
description: A simple web app to track and categorize daily expenses. Users can add, view, edit and delete transactions with real-time updates.

title: Mailbox Client
description: A web-based email client that allows users to send, receive, and manage emails with real-time updates and authentication.
